title: Pasta with Trapanese Pesto
source: The Food of Sicily - Fabrizia Lanza
categories: The Food of Sicily - Fabrizia Lanza
ingredients: - 4 cups (80 g) loosely packed fresh basil leaves
- 1 cup (150 g) skin-on almonds, blanched and peeled
- 1 pound (450 g) Fresh Busiate Pasta or Fresh Cavatelli
directions: 1. In a food processor, combine the basil, olive oil, garlic, and 1 teaspoon salt and puree until very smooth. Add the almonds and pulse until coarsely chopped. Transfer the pesto to a large bowl and stir in the tomato.2. In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook the pasta until al dente.
